snippet: The Oakland Raiders have been recognized for their superb season with an NFL-best seven players named to next month's Pro Bowl when the league announced the rosters on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: The Oakland Raiders have been recognized for their superb season with an NFL-best seven players named to next month's Pro Bowl when the league announced the rosters on Tuesday.

headline.main: Raiders' Resurgence Reflected in AFC Pro Bowl Roster
headline.print_headline: Raiders' Resurgence Reflected in AFC Pro Bowl Roster
